meta_title: What is Lead Time? Definition and Industrial Importance
meta_description: Lead time is the total duration from process initiation to completion. Understand its impact on MRO inventory, safety stock, and industrial maintenance efficiency.
title: Lead Time Definition

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Lead Time Definition

image_prompt: A high-end, photo-realistic industrial warehouse scene. In the foreground, a professional maintenance manager in a clean reflective vest and hardhat is looking at a digital tablet. In the background, automated guided vehicles (AGVs) are moving crates near organized high-bay racking. The lighting is bright and modern, emphasizing a high-tech, efficient logistics environment. No text or overlays.
